overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by 183-day rule or permanent establishment.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Exemptions include personal allowance and dependent deductions.

corporate_tax.small_business_rate: 10% for small businesses with revenue under 1 million RSD.
corporate_tax.deductions: Deductible expenses include business expenses, depreciation, and interest.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt.

vat_gst.reduced_rate: 10% on certain basic items and tourism services.

property_tax.exemptions: Exemptions may apply for certain properties, such as primary residence.

special_economic_zones.name: Free Zone Novi Sad
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Tax holiday for the first 10 years, reduced corporate tax rate of 12%.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

additional_notes.political_risks: Political and economic stability is generally good.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Serbia has a relatively stable economy with low inflation.
additional_notes.legal_system: The legal system is well-developed and generally efficient.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 56th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
